name: realism
content:
realism noun [U]
(THOUGHT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a way of thinking and acting based on facts and what is possible, rather than on hopes for things that are unlikely to happen: His decision not to expand the business shows his down-to-earth realism. Compare
idealism
science, social science
  specialized in science and philosophy, the belief that objects continue to exist in the world even when no one is there to see them

(ART)
art, literature, theatre & film
